welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boskoop, the charming city famous for its beautiful flower nurseries and scenic canals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique charm and tranquility of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's oldest and smallest terminal, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Schiphol's main terminal, with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Schiphol's newest and most modern terminal, primarily used for intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 4 hours per device, but can be renewed.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base is used for military operations and flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
